text: Mark off the width and height of the picture. Add guidelines for Bishounen’s body. Draw an oval for his head. Add a line, which will act as the center of the head.
Sketch Bishounen’s torso, neck and orange.
Add guidelines for his facial features and hand.
Outline the shapes of Bishounen’s arms and eyes.
Draw the hair without any fringe, add eyebrows and eye contour.
Add some separated locks of hair and his fringe. Work on the boy’s ears and eyes. Draw his T-shirt and medallion.
Work on the whole figure, paying special attention to detail.
Contour Bishounen, trying to vary the thickness and darkness of the line. Add more detail, add a tree. Erase all guidelines.
